New Records: Mitchell Marsh scored 177* from 132 balls, including 26 boundaries and nine sixes
Key Match Events: Australia successfully chased down 307 to win the match
Mitchell Marsh's arrival turned the match in Australia's favor
Australia dismissed key Bangladesh batsmen through sharp fielding
Pre-Game Insights: Pat Cummins won the toss and opted to bowl first
Glenn Maxwell and Mitchell Starc were rested to manage workload
Post-Match Reflections: Australia advanced to the semi-finals with confidence
Bangladesh's tournament journey ended with four points
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mitchell Marsh's performance was highlighted as a key moment in the tournament
Bangladesh's top scorer Tawhid Hridoy made 74
Australia's fielding was crucial in dismissing key Bangladesh players
Others: Australia's team lineup included Travis Head, David Warner, and Steve Smith
Bangladesh's team lineup included Najmul Hossain Shanto as stand-in captain
